website_summaries.verdict: For instant relief that really works quickly for your child, try these suppositories.
pros: Gentle enough to be used on babies
This product really is the best if your child is in pain and needs to have a bowel movement for relief right away
It works and then it is done
cons: They are suppositories, which means they must be inserted rectally

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. I got them for my three year old because she was showing symptoms of possible IBS , only pooping two or three times in almost two weeks! It alternated between diarrhea and constipation. She had no complaints taking them. I do think they helped her irregularity some, but not as much as she needed. I've since switched her over to Digestive Advantage which seems to do better. She now has normal poops about 4-5 times a week. So there's one relieved mommy here, no pun intended haha.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyMelia

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AWFUL and it taste even worse! I tried to mix it with everything with ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWFUL and it taste even worse! I tried to mix it with everything with no luck what so ever! My daughter loves prune juice and that couldn't even mask the taste...i wish i listened to all the other reviews before buying! DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: A+D Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: My 3 yo liked the taste
customer_reviews.text: For a severe chronic constipation, this is just not what worked for my child. We needed something stronger. My 3 yo liked the taste, didn't complain when asked to take them, but we saw no change in his stool pattern after weeks trying these at the request of our physician. For children with mild or occasional constipation this might be better for.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Better option that MiraLax therapy
customer_reviews.text: We have two kids who are supposed to be on MiraLax therapy for IBS and a neurological condition. We use this instead and it works great. No terrible stomach cramps, only once a day, and the taste isn't terrible (not great, but not terrible). This is cheaper at WalMart, but our 2 nearest WalMarts no longer carry it so we have to pay more to get it from PediaLax themselves (kind of backwards, right?). The boxes also have coupons for $1 off their products so I can save $1 on their other stuff WalMart still has in store.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Testa

customer_reviews.title: Relief!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every once in a while, my toddler son gets constipated which causes him extreme discomfort. We’ve tried all types of home remedies trying to help him get some relief or ease the discomfort. None of it seems to work. We have tried to avoid aiding the situation with medicines and other pharmaceutical remedies. But when your child is writhing on the ground crying and sobbing from the discomfort, you will try anything to help them. Pedialax is a miracle worker! Within about five minutes of application, my son Is usually able to pass some of the blockage and returns to being a happy camper. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jelike

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I give my daughter (almost 3) when I notice she’s constipated every once in a while. They seem to work for her and it does not seem to be harsh or immediate for her but does seem to get the process going. I only use for OCCASIONAL constipation. I don’t think they should be used all the time
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Soo Bitter! I can’t hide it in anything.
customer_reviews.text: Both of my children, 3 and 5, hate this stuff. I’m so disappointed because I have always liked the Pedia-Lax products. My 5 year old suffers from Gigantic BM’s. I was so happy when I seen they made a softener. But I can’t get them to drink it in anything! It is so Bitter.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: My toddler won’t eat it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my toddler to chew on to get probiotics in his system. However, being that they are tablets, and not gummies, has made this a bit more tricky. He put it in his mouth and then spit it right back out. I’m guessing that he doesn’t like the flavor. I made the mistake of buying these, assuming that they were gummies, and not tablets. It’ll teach me to read the box a little bit closer in the future.
customer_reviews.author: a. holtz

customer_reviews.title: Helpful in a Gentle Way
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that we've been pleased with and bought multiple times. It "helps things move along" for our child -- not in an explosive, painful or uncomfortable way. Our child was having difficulty with constipation and this has been extremely helpful in regulating bowel movements. One a day has made all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jack F&F

customer_reviews.title: THANK GOODNESS!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for these! My daughter has always had trouble with pooping, and she'll cry, scream, sweat and shakes in pain when she's trying to poo... we have tried so many supplements, as well as adding and deleting foods from her diet, and it's extremely difficult to get her system under control. I'm not sure what I would do without having these handy.. poor thing isn't thrilled when she sees the box because she knows what happens next, but a little while later, she's relieved and can be her happy self again. I'm very thankful for this product.
customer_reviews.author: candi

customer_reviews.title: Really works well.
customer_reviews.text: Our little guy had not gone in 5 days. We tried a CVS infant constipation med and prunes and still nothing which told us the blockage was lower. We rush ordered this product, used it immediately and 10 minutes later he went twice and he felt so much better. He was dancing for joy. So were we because the next step was going to the hospital. Thanks PediaLax!
customer_reviews.author: lajollabub

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I’m highly disappointed in the taste. I don’t have a picky toddler. She has no issues with taking any other liquid medication, but this has an aweful taste. I can’t even mix it in juice and get it down myself. For a toddler/children’s product they really need to work on fixing the flavor/taste profile. I can’t really speak to its effectiveness because I can’t get it down to try it.
customer_reviews.author: A&B

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: These things are a life saver for my daughter. She is 5 yo and has a disability that has lead to regular constipation. I use these about every other day on her and they work almost instantly. There is a bit of a technique that i have learned but once you get the hang of it, it’s not difficult. I do add a bit of extra Vaseline to the tip of it as the amount in the cap is sparse. So glad to have found these!
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible taste! My daughter did not want to drink this no matter what I mixed it with. I finally took a sip of it mixed with juice and oh my God it was so bitter and disgusting! This was with the minimum dose of one teaspoon. I can't imagine using three teaspoons. This item is also non returnable. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old son has been having inconsistent and hard bowels for months now. It was so bad he would cry, strain, and bleed whenever he pooped. We changed his diet a little, added these once a day, and the change is evident. He now poops regularly and it’s a soft consistency. It didn’t take long to kick in either. He also likes the flavor; takes the tablet with no problem. Will absolutely continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Latoya W.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong order received but exchanged easily
customer_reviews.text: Update: they exchanged the single pack for the 3 pack without trouble. My son likes the taste and I find that they work well to relieve his constipation. This is the 1st time I've ordered them from Amazon and I only received 1 out of the 3 packs I ordered. I started a return, hopefully they will fulfill the rest of my order.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Shorted 2 boxes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 boxes only received 1. Not wanting to write a bad review just nit sure who to contact so I can get my other 2 boxes
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: son cried and stated throat was scratchy
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived within an hour of the order being placed which was great since my son had been constipated for a few days; however, upon administer the recommend dose he started to scream and cry that his throat was scratchy- this went on for over 10 minutes (he was drinking water and juice in the meantime)....for that reason I would not recommend it for children
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used these for infant grandson when he was all constipated and worked with in justva few minutes. Will keep these onhand everwhere we go.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie  A Slack

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked!
customer_reviews.text: Wish this worked. My daughter wont take this stuff in any way. Tried to mix it in juice and it changes the whole flavor. I thought she was just being picky because she saw me put the stuff in the juice but when i tried it i knew she wasn't being picky. It tasted not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ortega's

customer_reviews.title: works great for my 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 10 son. He would become constipated at least once a week and complain of stomach aches. He has been taking these probiotics for a few months and has not had any more problems. He tells me they are really great tasting and I have never had trouble getting him to take them.
customer_reviews.author: Tlb

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for my toddler who was withholding BM after being ...
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver for my toddler who was withholding BM after being potty trained!! He went a full week without going and I tried every natural remedy I’ve heard of! This was the only thing that helped
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great product does what it's made for.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 3 yr old to help him out. He loves them. And they work great! I gave him 3 the first day which was a Sunday Monday he had pooped. Tuesday nothing and Wednesday nothing. Thursday it completely cleaned him out. That was also giving him 3 each of those days. I am now only give it to him every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My baby has always had trouble with constipation. These work amazing for her. When I can tell she having trouble going I use these and within minutes she's had a bowel movement and she's great. It doesn't hurt her at all. I'm so glad we found these and I like them better in the liquid form than the other glycerin suppositories.
customer_reviews.author: honey

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that's effective for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: We were recommended this by our pediatrician. It's the only thing that helps my daughter with her chronic constipation that isn't painful. I highly recommend this for babies and toddlers with pooping issues!
customer_reviews.author: PMarch

customer_reviews.title: Kids Eat Them No Problem! Rated Best Value, 2nd Best Overall On Labdoor.com
customer_reviews.text: Kids enjoy them and not sure if it's directly related to just these items, but they sure seem to be sick a lot less. Not really sure how to rate these other than the fact they are priced well and rated high as far as potency and label accuracy (actually perform better than label states) on labdoor.com
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great taste for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a problem with chewable when it comes to medicine but she had no complaints about these. I am so glad they are great tasting for when they need it. I am glad to have these on hand. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not tasteless
customer_reviews.text: My kid hates this it says it’s flavorless also it’s red so hard to hide
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Its work...
customer_reviews.text: Taste is bad, so I have to mix with formula milk... My 3yrs old take it every other day and no more crying..or..20 min. waiting. Try other chewable but the taste she does not like, so this seem to work for her.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Trinh

customer_reviews.title: no matter what I have tried my kid will not drink it
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I have added to this- she will not drink it. I bought three box which was my fault, but I basically need to throw it away because she refuses and its painful to watch her try to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: stacie strauss

customer_reviews.title: Taste Horrible!!! Absolutely Disgusting!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easily mixes with juice my butt!! My kid will not take this at all no matter how hard I try. I tasted it myself and it's possibly the worst thing I've ever tasted and it took forever to get the taste put of my mouth it was still there after eating and drinking
customer_reviews.author: Chase Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible flavor
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely hated it. Tried mixing it with anything and everything and still wouldn't drink it. Then I tasted it and now I know why. It's pretty disgusting so if you have a picky kid this is def not for them!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Colson

customer_reviews.title: Paid for 3, received 1 box
customer_reviews.text: Paid for three pack and only received one box.... waiting for replacement
customer_reviews.author: Rose Blacker

customer_reviews.title: Taste is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The taste is horrible! But my picky 12mo old managed to eat it mixed with some applesauce and yogurt. The after taste is BITTER. Miralax powder worked much better and is tasteless.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Kids don't like flavor
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is pretty awful. So much color and strong flavor. Haven't had such a bad experience with kid's flavored liquid before, and this was sold in a 3 pack only. :( I tasted it, tried it diluted, just couldn't do it!! Bad. Can't work if you can't get it in.
customer_reviews.author: MN Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Great for occasional constipation
customer_reviews.text: Took my 2yr old on a road trip. This helped her go after the road trip constipation made her miserable. We have extras but it doesn’t expire for awhile so I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna

customer_reviews.title: only came with one
customer_reviews.text: This only came with one pack even though the product description clearly states it is supposed to come with 3. So I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: hCatherineG

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The taste is SO strong it cannot be hidden in juice or food, making it unusable for our five year old with autism. We tried in many different ways. And Amazon won’t accept a return. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Some were missing
customer_reviews.text: The listing says pack of 3 but we only received one :( my 3 year old eats it like a candy and it helps him go. I just wish that they would have sent us pack of 3 like it says in the listing but instead we only received one.
customer_reviews.author: URLOVED

customer_reviews.title: Fast working
customer_reviews.text: When our child gets backed up, this works like a charm. Relief within 5 minutes (usually less).
customer_reviews.author: Judy E.

customer_reviews.title: They work instantly
customer_reviews.text: My son has been having constipation issues for a while and this is the only that worked for him, also always worked within seconds. Finally was able to make an appointment with his pediatrician but this helped tremendously. Now I have some extra just in case.
customer_reviews.author: njuarez

customer_reviews.title: Works super fast.
customer_reviews.text: My son refuses to poop so he gets backed up till it’s uncomfortsnke to pass. So we tried these. Instantly made him go. We were so relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Noire

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and works fast.
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome find. Works fast. We call them poop pills at my house. They are never abused by the kids. They tell me when they need them.
customer_reviews.author: Slipknott

customer_reviews.title: worst taste ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm super disappointed because the reviews were so great and I thought we had finally found a solution to the pooping problem. Neither of my kids will touch it. The smell and taste are so overwhelming there is no way to hide it. Out 25 bucks and still no solution.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT GIVE TO ANY ANIMAL WITH A TONGUE
customer_reviews.text: I cannot overstate how bad this tastes. The bottle says "tart". That is a straight up lie. Well, it might be tart but I can't tell over the DEBILITATING bitterness. No amount of dilution makes this palatable. God have mercy if you try biting the bullet and taking it straight. Definitely the most bitter substance I've ever tasted. I had to ask for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a 3 pack as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I selected “3 pack” and only received one box of laxatives. I was charged $15, which is supposed to be the price for 3 boxes. Incredibly frustrating, will return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to get things moving within 24 hours, she did not like the taste. It was a huge fight to get her to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: MagS

customer_reviews.title: Kids constipation relief
customer_reviews.text: My son has occasional constipation this helps him a lot in. Providing bowel relief in minutes. Keep it handy for occasional usage.
customer_reviews.author: K Raj

customer_reviews.title: Received an item that expired 4 months ago
customer_reviews.text: Would give zero stars if I could, as I received an item that was 4 months past its expiration. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Beekimus

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT receive 3 boxes!
customer_reviews.text: I paid for 3 boxes and received one box! Not happy! 😡
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S. Deems

customer_reviews.title: only received 1 box, supposed to be 3 pack
customer_reviews.text: I suppose to have received a 3 pack of this, but only received 1 box, please kindly send out the other 2 boxes
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Boeskool

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: My son has autism and struggles with bowel issues. These have really come in handy to help him go poop.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Works but very slowly
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but takes a looking time. The suppositories are instant. They'll need to drink a lot of water as well.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: So gross my taste buds were traumatized after 1.5 hours and I had only done a taste test for my child. I dumped it and went for other options.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Orem

customer_reviews.title: Bad medicine
customer_reviews.text: I let my daughter drink it two times, It cause horrible vomit when my daughter drink it every time, so it won’t worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Zhan

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It's been received for several days. It's been used once. The effect is very good. Spare it for two babies!
customer_reviews.author: young

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste good. Kids won't take it.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't taste good, and my kids just won't drink it even if I sneak it in there.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! It works !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Works wonders with my 3yr old toddler! Very thankful my toddler can poop after eating pedialax!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a must have item when having children. It helps my little one for a couple years now she takes it from time to time
customer_reviews.author: C.Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: These are very tasty. Both grandbabies take them with no problem. Until the baby was old enough, I ground them to a powder and sprinkled over his strawberries! Very yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Just me in wv

customer_reviews.title: quite effective
customer_reviews.text: is effective for kids with its small size, and it took no more than 5 minutes to release
customer_reviews.author: hopestay

customer_reviews.title: Worked within minutes
customer_reviews.text: Now I just received this product today, and have only used it once, but it worked within minutes and he didn't struggle like he usually does. Hope it continues to work, as he struggles with constant constipation.
customer_reviews.author: Casey C.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Health products for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter eats these every other day. Never has a bathroom problem and it's easy to get her to eat them because they taste good. Yums is the perfect thing to call them. Appealing and Healthy for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Angie D.

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested, mother approved
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the way these taste and they seem to work well enough (sometimes I take them if I am out of my probiotics). The price at about 10.50 is reasonable (when I first found these locally I paid 15 on sale).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Ener

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, Potent Taste
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I did, my 2.5 year old could taste this and it was terrible. Tried mixing it with juices, yogurt; anything you can think of and she wouldn’t touch it
customer_reviews.author: Alex D

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as a 3-pack of 30 tablet bottles each for $16+ which is what I expected. I received one bottle. This should be 3 bottles for this price! What a rip off!!
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to have on hand to keep picky toddlers regular!
customer_reviews.text: Very tart and sweet must be taken with orange juice. Works well and is all natural
customer_reviews.author: C. Bodkin-Clarke

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old Granddaughter has issues with constipation, pedia-lax helps her go. I ordered this today july 1st and it arrived today🙂
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Didnt help at all
customer_reviews.text: this product did not work for my daughter. The taste was fine and she didnt complain of that.. But to be honest, and did nothing for her constipation
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Taste is awful
customer_reviews.text: The taste of this is awful. I tried everything with my 2 1/2 yr old grandson to get him it to take it. Didn't matter what kind of juice I put it in it has a tarte, almost bitter taste. Because of the good reviews it got I also ordered a 3 pack. Stupid me. This is a non-refundable tem so I I'm out of luck. Should have just gotten one and tried it first
customer_reviews.author: eva harmon

customer_reviews.title: Toddler hates taste
customer_reviews.text: My toddler tried it mixed with juice (as recommended) and refuses to drink it. Tried three days in a row to no avail. It smells strong too. Got culturelle regularity powder packets that I’m mixing with milk with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: andi013

customer_reviews.title: i'd have to say its ok
customer_reviews.text: Since I got this for my grandchild, everything seemed to 'come out ok', not pun intended.
customer_reviews.author: samspader

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like delivery method
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve read more carefully. Don’t like this delivery method - it caused bleeding. Was recommended by my son’s GI office, so I purchased this value pack. Now I’m stuck with all this product I don’t plan to use again. A big waste...
customer_reviews.author: Toos

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Daughter hates the chalkiness.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Daughter hates the taste. Maybe because it’s chalky but they seem to be helping her.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: We have to purchase this for our daughter and have for over a year now. Works well to accomplish a cleaner digestive system, that's more regular. Overall much better rice here then getting it at drug stores.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Padgett

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was flavorless
customer_reviews.text: It would probably work great if I could get my two year old to drink it. We've tried putting it in apple juice and a smoothie and after one drink she won't touch the rest.
customer_reviews.author: df

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is the only medicine I’ve found that my kid will eat willingly. Great flavor for picky kids!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great price, normally $10 a bottle at local pharmacy and they work well!

customer_reviews.title: Missing quantity
customer_reviews.text: Received only 1 box when description clearly states "Pack of 3". Looks like the pack was ripped open before packing.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E. Ohagerty

customer_reviews.title: Can’t say how much I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say how much I love this product. Works very well for my 8yo when he occasionally needs a laxative. Wish I had tried this first.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: Not sure as yet. I think this gives my sun diarrhea might have to reduce dosage
customer_reviews.author: EmCee

customer_reviews.title: Taste good and work well
customer_reviews.text: These are difficult to find and can be expensive when they are found. This 3 pack helps us save money. Works great to help children get things moving in the potty area!
customer_reviews.author: Sara G

customer_reviews.title: A spoonful of sugar can’t touch this...
customer_reviews.text: This is for the Pedia Lax Docusate stool softener. It’s GROSS! My kid will eat anything, but he runs away when he sees or smells this one. We tried it in all kinds of things, or with a chaser. No luck. On the other hand, chasing him around the house with a cupful of this probably helped him poop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It did not taste good my children will not take it I tried the ...
customer_reviews.text: It did not taste good my children will not take it I tried the juice suggestions I saw and nothing worked. I waisted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Motherof6

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Well my daughter absolutely hated it, and I could even stomach it when i tasted it. So wasted 3 bottles. This was definitely not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for SB baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has Spina Bifida and struggles with getting her stool moving. This works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: briana jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Only received 1 pack
customer_reviews.text: So far my son seems to like these and he's been able to get some relief. 1 star because I only received 1 pack when I ordered a pack of 3.
customer_reviews.author: amy rutzer

customer_reviews.title: The taste is super strong! I couldnt drink it myself (no one ...
customer_reviews.text: The taste is super strong! I couldnt drink it myself (no one in the house could), of course my child hate it. We tried with many many juices and didnt work. I read reviews were it said children drank it with no problem; dont be so sure about that :( Cant say it doesnt work though . Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Gómez de Pino

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved
customer_reviews.text: It works well. It does have a slight taste of tartness but can be masked in juice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How delivered, not overall function of product
customer_reviews.text: I am reviewing how the package came, not how well it works at this time. I received it today and the box was bent/smashed. I could handle that, but it was not sealed and when I opened it to give to my child, 2 of the 30 tablet seals were opened. I believe it is due to packaging, however it makes me Leary about giving them to my child to consume.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: We are never without these
customer_reviews.text: We use these on my daughter with special needs. She is frequently backed up, even with regular use of a stool softener. These work fast and are so much easier to use than holding in a traditional suppository.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate on items shipped
customer_reviews.text: I only received 1 bottle instead of 3 as advertised! Can I please get some help with this?
customer_reviews.author: Mmm

customer_reviews.title: Taste is awful
customer_reviews.text: My toddler hated the taste of this medicine. We tried mixing it in everything - white milk, chocolate milk, orange juice, cranberry juice, water. Finally I mixed it in a smoothie and it worked. I used berries, cranberry juice and vanilla greek yogurt. I only did half a dose because I was afraid my son would be able to taste the medicine and refuse to drink the smoothie. Consequently I was making 2-3 smoothies a day. It was a lot of work, but I did finally get him to take a full dose of the medicine. We ended up switching to Miralax because it is a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: I was suppose to get 3 boxes
customer_reviews.text: I got my order but where’s the other two boxes? There was suppose to be 3! Crooks!
customer_reviews.author: Bassman

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They take longer to work than a liquid suppository, but they don’t cause any discomfort or stomach cramps. Much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults also
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 30+ year old and have used these for years for occasional constipation. I prefer these over adult products but definitely works as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 bottle sent
customer_reviews.text: For some reason only one bottle was delivered, not three like the description. Please remedy, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Andra Pike

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Trying different things for my toddler. Everything I've tried she continues to be constipated. Hopefully this works
customer_reviews.author: racheal hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Good Gummy, that kids will eat that work to get regular bowel movements
customer_reviews.text: Had a 4 year old that was not getting enough fiber - not only do these taste good and she eats them without complaint they worked perfectly to get her regular bowel movements.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Give my 4 year old one a day for now or he gets backed up quickly. He loves the taste and goes #2 regularly now.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lowell

product_meta.title: Pedia-Lax Laxative Liquid Glycerin Suppositories for Kids, Ages 2-5, 6 CT, 3 Pack
product_meta.description: Style:Liquid Glycerin Suppositories| Size:6 Count (Pack of 3)Poop should just happen. When it doesn't, there's Pedia-Lax. Designed for kids ages 2-5, Pedia-Lax Laxative Liquid Glycerin Suppositories help to provide gentle relief from occasional constipation. Small and easy to use with a lubricated kid-friendly tip, Pedia-Lax Laxative Liquid Glycerin Suppositories bring relief in 15-60 minutes. The convenient, no-mess applicator makes it easier to administer than traditional suppositories and the sodium-free solution provides relief in minutes without upsetting the digestive system. See package for full instructions and dosage information. Pedia-Lax is the #1 pediatrician-recommended children’s laxative brand.* Unlike adult laxatives, Pedia-Lax Laxative Liquid Glycerin Suppositories are designed for kids and are a safe solution for kids' occasional constipation. Parents keep kids growing and Pedia-Lax helps keep kids going. *IQVIA, using the ProVoice Survey October 1, 2019 to October 31, 2019. Pedia-Lax products are FSA- and HSA-eligible in the U.S.
feature_bullets: Provides predictable, gentle relief from occasional constipation in 15-60 minutes
Convenient, no-mess applicators are small and easy to use with a lubricated kid-friendly tip
Pedia-Lax is the #1 pediatrician-recommended children’s laxative brand* *IQVIA, using the ProVoice Survey October 1, 2019 to October 31, 2019
Contains 3 packs of Pedia-Lax Laxative Liquid Glycerin Suppositories, 6 bottles, 4 mL each
FSA- and HSA-eligible product in the U.S.
